name: Happy Shape Blast
summary:
Just simple old school swap and match, with colorful funny shapes. There are almost 1000 big landscape mode levels. Some are challenging, some are easier, but all are fun and playable by young and old!
Match the colorful blocks, balls, triangles and more shapes by swapping them and lining up 3 or more. Create bombs and boosters by matching more to help win the levels before time runs out!
